headline.main: SPANISH ARE SHARP ON TANGIER STAND; Foreign Minister Indicates U.S. Has No Place in Control of North African Area FRENCH VIEW BELITTLED Serrano Suner Says Nation That Was Defeated Showed Recalcitrance on Occupation

lead_paragraph: MADRID, Jan. 1 -- Foreign Minister Ramon Serrano Suner today sought to explain to Spain why he suddenly liquidated the international administration of Tangier.
abstract: Foreign Min Serrano Suner on reasons for Tangier inc under Spanish rule; Spanish press comment on Roosevelt s on Greece; links Portugal fate with Axis

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS

snippet: MADRID, Jan. 1 -- Foreign Minister Ramon Serrano Suner today sought to explain to Spain why he suddenly liquidated the international administration of Tangier....

byline.original: By T.J. HAMILTONWireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
